resources.string: Elves are a tall and beautiful race coming from the southern forests of the known lands. They are skilled agile swordsmen and archers, adept in offensive and deceive magic. As long as their race started accepting the human culture more and more, they prefer to settle in human cities where they can trade freely and prosper. Nevertheless, elves are very selfish and proud of their southern origin. Even though elves have not participated in any conflicts recently, they are often hired as bodyguards by noblemen.

Humans are the original race settled in the kingdom. Most of them are farmers and peaceful laborers. However, some of humans become proficient knights defending the king himself, graceful and courageously. Since the war with the orcs broke down, humans have been in constant battles, and a lot of strong warriors appeared. This race possesses strength and very helpful in team fights. Humans are a very well-balanced race.

Orcs came from the east lands of the kingdom around one thousand years ago. They are a very aggressive and strong race, skilled on close combat and defensive skills. Led by great kings of the past, orcs defended unskilled humans for hundreds of years conquering more and more territory. However, they were not able to defeat humans and had to write a peace treaty. Now orcs are frequent guests at large cities, especially in pubs. Many orcs who abandoned their lands serve the human king.

The undead are creatures which appeared recently in the lands of the kingdom. No one knows where their place of origin is, or what they really are. Led by malicious wizards of the undead, they conquered most of the northern land, driving humans away. The undead are skilled in black magic and possess unique abilities, which other races cannot grasp. Some of them are sometimes seen in the capital of the kingdom. It is rumored that some undead warriors are trained by humans and serve the king as a secret weapon.
